title: I feel like damage charts do the same thing here as in WoW
body: like people have all this damage because they're constantly scrappers, and i play where i prioritize taking towers over fighting, once i'm strong i'll wreck a teamfight almost single handedly, then i get some guy saying i suck because i did 20k damage in a 30 minute game despite taking almost all the towers solo and murdering the enemy team in the game winning fight, and always being around to do dragons, and baron.
